member.summary: Deletes a column from a database.

member.name: F:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.IdeaDatabaseCreatorOptions.None
member.summary: No options.

member.name: F:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.IdeaDatabaseCreatorOptions.GenerateUniqueTableName
member.summary: If set, the generator tries to create a unique database name starting from the suggested name.

member.name: F:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.IdeaDatabaseCreatorOptions.OverwriteExistingDatabase
member.summary: If set and the database already exists, the generator overwrites it.
Creates a new IDEA database and optionally appends data to it.
member.param: An IExecutionContext reference to the execution context. An exception is thrown if this reference is null.

The name of the database. An exception is thrown if databaseName is null or empty. If options includes GenerateUniqueDatabaseName, the method tries to create a unique database name starting from databaseName.
A ComputedColumnData array containing the meta data of the new table's columns. An exception is throw if this array is null or empty.
An optional function that adds rows to the database. This reference can be null.
An IdeaTableCreatorOptions value that specifies whether the method creates a unique table name or not.
member.returns: The name of the table.
member.exception: If databaseName is empty or if it consists only of white spaces.
If the database already exists and the option OverwriteExistingDatabase was not set.

member.name: M:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.IdeaDatabaseCreatorHelper.AddColumnsToIdeaDatabaseDefinition(COMDBLib.ITableDef,Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.ComputedColumnData[])
member.summary: Appends a set of columns to an IDEA COMDBLib.TableDef object.
member.param: The COMDBLib.TableDef to which the method appends new columns. An exception is thrown if this reference is null.
A ComputedColumnData array that contains the metadata of the columns to add. An exception is thrown if this reference is null. In case the array is empty, the method does nothing.

member.name: M:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.IdeaDatabaseCreatorHelper.InitializeIdeaField(COMDBLib.IField,Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.ComputedColumnData)
member.summary: Initializes a new COMDBLib.IField object.
member.param: The COMDBLib.Field to initialize. An exception is thrown if this reference is null.
The ComputedColumnData object that supplies the property values for the new field. An exception is thrown if this reference is null.

member.name: M:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.IdeaDatabaseCreatorHelper.AppendRecord(COMDBLib.IRecordSet,Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.ComputedColumnData[],System.String[])
member.summary: Appends a new row to a record set.
member.param: A COMDBLib.IRecordSet object to which the method appends a row. An exception is thrown if this reference is null.
A ComputedColumnData array that contains the metadata of the columns to set. An exception is thrown if this reference is null.
A string array containing the values of the columns in columnsData. Conversions will be done using the Invariant culture. An exception is thrown if this reference is null.

member.name: M:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.IdeaDatabaseCreatorHelper.SetColumnValue(COMDBLib.IRecord,System.Int32,Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.ComputedColumnData,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the value of a column.
member.param: The IRecord object to modify. An exception is thrown if this reference is null.
The one-base index of the column to update.
The metadata object of the column. An exception is thrown if this reference is null.
The value to set. Conversions will be done using the Invariant culture.

member.summary: Performs an extraction on the specified database.
member.param: A reference to the source database. An exception is thrown if this reference is null.
The name of the destination database. An exception is thrown if this reference is null or empty.
An optional sequence specifying the names of the columns to include in the extraction. If null, all columns will be included.
An optional sequence of new columns to be added to the result database during the extraction or null if no new columns are to be added.
An optional set of keys to be used to sort the database. If null or empty, the result database will not be sorted.
An optional boolean that specifies whether the extraction creates a virtual database.
An optional criteria used to identify the records to be processed. If null or empty, no criteria will be used. The default value is null.
The one-based index of the first row to extract. An exception is thrown if this value is not in the range [1, database-record-count] unless the source record count is zero.

The one-based index of the last row to extract or -1 (i.e., the last valid index). If the source database is empty, zero is also valid. An exception is thrown if this value is not -1, 0 (see above) or in the range [1, database-record-count].
An optional boolean that specifies if the method should disable progress notifications. Default value: false.
member.exception: If startRow or endRow are outside the valid range of values.

member.summary: Creates a new pivot table result inside an IDEA database and optionally exports the the result to an IDEA database and detects the actual result name.
member.typeparam: The type of the data field collection element.
member.param: A reference to the database to which the pivot table result will be added. An exception is thrown if this reference is null.

A string that specifies the name of the result or null. If null, empty or if it consists of only white-space chars, IDEA will choose a default name.
IDEA will make sure that the name of the new result is unique in the list of the results of the target database.
To have the method retrieve the actual result name, a potentially expensive operation, the caller must turn on the PivotTableOptions.DetectActualResultName.
Specifies the sequence of fields to be put in the columns of the pivot table. An exception is thrown if this reference is null.
Specifies the sequence of fields to be put in the rows of the pivot table. An exception is thrown if this reference is null.
Specifies the sequence of fields to be put in the data area of the pivot table. An exception is thrown if this reference is null.
Specifies the sequence of fields to be put in the page area of the pivot table or null.
A PivotTableOptions value that specifies zero, one or more options that will affect the behavior of the creator.
A string reference that receives the actual result name if the option PivotTableOptions.DetectActualResultName was set; otherwise null.
member.exception: If database, columnFields, rowFields or dataFields is null.

member.summary: Creates or updates a database index.

member.name: F:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.IdeaHelper.IdeaNumberFormatInfo
member.summary: Provides information for formatting numbers like IDEA's @str
Performs an extraction on the specified database.
member.param: A reference to the source database. An exception is thrown if this reference is null.
The name of the destination database. An exception is thrown if this reference is null or empty.
An optional sequence specifying the names of the columns to include in the extraction. If null, all columns will be included.
An optional sequence of new columns to be added to the result database during the extraction or null if no new columns are to be added.
An optional set of keys to be used to sort the database. If null or empty, the result database will not be sorted.
An optional boolean that specifies whether the extraction creates a virtual database.
An optional criteria used to identify the records to be processed. If null or empty, no criteria will be used. The default value is null.
The one-based index of the first row to extract. An exception is thrown if this value is not in the range [1, database-record-count] unless the source record count is zero.

The one-based index of the last row to extract or -1 (i.e., the last valid index). If the source database is empty, zero is also valid. An exception is thrown if this value is not -1, 0 (see above) or in the range [1, database-record-count].
An optional boolean that specifies if the method should disable progress notifications. Default value: false.
member.exception: If startRow or endRow are outside the valid range of values.

member.name: T:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.ResultCreator
member.summary: Defines the base class of all the other result creators.

member.name: M:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.ResultCreator.#ctor(Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Interfaces.CustomImportRoutines.Runtime.ICirExecutionContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new ResultCreator instance.
member.param: An ICirExecutionContext reference to the current context. An exception is thrown if this reference is null.

member.name: F:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.ResultCreator.m_context
member.summary: An IDataPreparationContext reference to the current context. Init: .ctor

member.name: M:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.ResultCreator.Create
member.summary: Creates the result and deletes the registered temporary databases at the end of the task. Delegates the core task to DoCreate.
member.returns: An ITestResultFile object that describes the result database.
member.exception: If the result cannot be created because its source is empty.

member.name: M:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.ResultCreator.DoCreate
member.summary: Creates the result.
member.returns: An ITestResultFile object that describes the result database.
member.remarks: The default implementation does not register the result file object in the current execution context. The default implementation removes the history of the result.

member.name: M:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.ResultCreator.DoCreateResultObject(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a result object for the specified database. DoCreate calls this method to wrap the result database in a TestResultFile object.
member.param: A string containing the name of the database. An exception is thrown if this reference is null or empty.
member.returns: An ITestResultFile object.
member.remarks: The default implementation does not register the result file object in the current execution context.

member.name: M:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.ResultCreator.DoCreateResultDatabase
member.summary: Creates the result database.
member.returns: A non-empty string containing the name of the result database.

member.name: M:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.ResultCreator.VerifyResultSourceIsNotNull(Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Interfaces.CustomImportRoutines.Runtime.ISimpleImportFile,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies that the specified source is not null and source.ImportedFileName is not null or empty. Logs an error and throws a Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Types.SourceDatabaseEmptyException if the source is null.
member.param: The ISimpleImportFile containing information about the source database.
The name of the result that cannot be created if the source is not valid. The method uses it in the error message.
The alias of the source database. The method uses it in the error message.
member.remarks: If source is null or source.ImportedFileName is null or empty, the method logs the error message 'ResultCannotBeCreatedBecauseDatabaseNotImportedMessage' and throws a Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Types.SourceDatabaseEmptyException.

member.name: M:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.ResultCreator.VerifyResultSourceIsNotEmpty(Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Interfaces.CustomImportRoutines.Runtime.ISimpleImportFile,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies that the specified source is not null and that its DatabaseRecordCount is not zero. Logs an error and throws a Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Types.SourceDatabaseEmptyException if the source is not valid.
member.param: The ISimpleImportFile containing information about the source database.
The name of the result that cannot be created if the source is not valid. The method uses it in the error message.
The alias of the source database. The method uses it in the error message.
member.exception: If source is null or if source.DatabaseRecordCount is zero.
member.remarks: If source is null, the method logs the error message 'ResultCannotBeCreatedBecauseDatabaseNotImportedMessage' and throws a System.InvalidOperationException. If source.DatabaseRecordCount is zero, the method logs the error message 'ResultCreationFailureDatabaseEmptyMessage' and throws a Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Types.SourceDatabaseEmptyException.

member.name: M:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.ResultCreator.VerifyResultSourceIsNotEmpty(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies that the specified source database is not empty. Logs an error and throws a Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Types.SourceDatabaseEmptyException if the source is empty.
member.param: The name of the source database. An exception is thrown if this name is null or empty.
The name of the result that cannot be created if the source is not valid. The method uses it in the error message.
member.remarks: If the source database is empty, the method logs the error message 'ResultCreationFailureDatabaseEmptyMessage' and throws a Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Types.SourceDatabaseEmptyException.

member.name: M:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.ResultCreator.VerifyResultSourceRecordCountIsNotZero(System.String,System.String,System.Int64)
member.summary: Logs an error and throws SourceDatabaseEmptyException if recordCount is zero.
member.param: The name of the source database.
The name of the result that cannot be created if the source is not valid.
The record count to test. If zero, the method throws SourceDatabaseEmptyException.
member.remarks: If recordCount is zero, the method logs the error message 'ResultCreationFailureDatabaseEmptyMessage' and throws a Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Types.SourceDatabaseEmptyException.

member.name: M:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.ResultCreator.VerifyResultSourceIsNotNullOrEmpty(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies that the specified source database is not empty. Logs an error and throws a Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Types.SourceDatabaseEmptyException if the source is empty.
member.param: The name of the source database. This string can be null or empty.
The name of the result that cannot be created if the source is not valid. The method uses it in the error message.
An optional string containing the logical name of the source database. The method uses this name in case sourceName is null or empty.
member.exception: If source is null or if source.DatabaseRecordCount is zero.
member.remarks: If the source database is empty, the method logs the error message 'ResultCreationFailureDatabaseEmptyMessage' and throws a Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Types.SourceDatabaseEmptyException. If sourceName is null or empty, the method logs the error message 'GetResultCannotBeCreatedBecauseDatabaseNotAvailableWarning' if sourceLogicalName is not null or empty or 'GetResultCannotBeCreatedBecauseDatabaseNotAvailableWarning' otherwise and throws a Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Types.SourceDatabaseEmptyException.

member.name: M:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.ResultCreator.VerifyResultSourceIsNotNullOrEmpty(Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Interfaces.TestResults.ITestResultFile,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies that the specified source database is not empty. Logs an error and throws a Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Types.SourceDatabaseEmptyException if the source is empty.
member.param: An ITestResultFile object that contains data about the source database. This object can be null or empty.
The name of the result that cannot be created if the source is not valid. The method uses it in the error message.
An optional string containing the logical name of the source database. The method uses this name in case sourceName is null or empty.
member.exception: If source is null or if source.Name is null or empty or if source.RecordCount is zero.
member.remarks: If the source database is empty, the method logs the error message 'ResultCreationFailureDatabaseEmptyMessage' and throws a Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Types.SourceDatabaseEmptyException. If source.Name is null or empty, the method logs the error message 'GetResultCannotBeCreatedBecauseDatabaseNotAvailableWarning' if sourceLogicalName is not null or empty or 'GetResultCannotBeCreatedBecauseDatabaseNotAvailableWarning' otherwise and throws a Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Types.SourceDatabaseEmptyException.

member.summary: Verifies that the specified sources are not null and that their DatabaseRecordCounts are not both zero. Logs an error and throws a Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Types.SourceDatabaseEmptyException if the sources are not valid.
member.param: The ISimpleImportFile containing information about the first source database.
The ISimpleImportFile containing information about the first source database.
The name of the result that cannot be created if the sources are not valid. The method uses it in the error message.
The alias of the first source database. The method uses it in the error message.
The alias of the second source database. The method uses it in the error message.
member.exception: If either firstSource or secondSource is null or if both DatabaseRecordCounts are zero.
member.remarks: If either the first source or the second source is null, the method logs the error message 'ResultCannotBeCreatedBecauseDatabaseNotImportedMessage' and throws a Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Types.SourceDatabaseEmptyException. If both DatabaseRecordCounts are zero, the method logs the error message 'ResultCreationFailureDatabaseEmptyMessage' and throws a System.InvalidOperationException.

member.name: M:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.ResultCreator.VerifyResultSourceIsNotEmpty(COMMONIDEACONTROLSLib.IIdeaDatabase,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies that the specified database is not empty. Logs an error and throws a Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Types.SourceDatabaseEmptyException if the database is empty.
member.param: The database to verify. An exception is thrown if this reference is null.
The name of the result that cannot be created if the source is not valid. The method uses it in the error message.
member.remarks: If the database is empty, the method logs the error message 'ResultCreationFailureDatabaseEmptyMessage' and throws a Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Types.SourceDatabaseEmptyException.

member.name: M:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.ResultCreator.AddTemporaryDatabaseForDeletion(System.String)

member.returns: True, if the database was added, false, if the collection of databases contains an entry with the same name (comparison: 'OrdinalIgnoreCase').

member.summary: Adds messages to inform the operator that columns with default values were added to a table that contributes to the result.
member.param: The name of the result. An exception is thrown if this string is null or empty.
The names of the columns with default values. An exception is thrown if this reference is null. If the sequence is empty, the method does nothing.

remarks.para: If the sequence of columns is empty, the method does nothing.

The messages will be added to a message group with the id '[ResultName].DefaultColumns'. If the function is called a second time with the same result name, the messages will be added to the same group.

member.summary: Creates an extraction to simulate a join with an empty secondary database (operation which is not supported in IDEA).
member.param: The name of the source database. The method assumes that the source database is not empty. An exception is thrown if it is null or empty.
The name of the destination database. An exception is thrown if this reference is null or empty.
A optional sequence specifying the names of the columns to include in the extraction. If null, all columns will be included.
An optional sequence of dummy computed columns to add to the result. These columns are the placeholders for the columns of the secondary database that cannot be joined.

If not null or empty, the method adds messages to inform the operator that columns with default values were added to a table that contributes to the result. This parameter is ignored if dummyComputedColumns is null.
An optional boolean that specifies whether the extraction creates a virtual database.
An optional criteria used to identify the records to be processed. If null or empty, no criteria will be used.

member.summary: Verifies that the specified source is not null and source.ImportedFileName is not null or empty. Logs an error and throws an Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Types.SourceDatabaseEmptyException if the source is null.
member.param: A reference to the execution context. An exception is thrown if this reference is null.
The ISimpleImportFile containing information about the source database.
The name of the result that cannot be created if the source is not valid. The method uses it in the error message.
The alias of the source database. The method uses it in the error message.
member.remarks: If source is null or source.ImportedFileName is null or empty, the method logs the error message 'ResultCannotBeCreatedBecauseDatabaseNotImportedMessage' and throws an Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Types.SourceDatabaseEmptyException.

member.name: M:Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.CustomImportRoutines.Common.ValidationHelper.VerifyResultSourceIsNotEmpty(Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Interfaces.IExecutionContext,Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Interfaces.CustomImportRoutines.Runtime.ISimpleImportFile,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies that the specified source is not null and that its DatabaseRecordCount is not zero. Logs an error and throws an Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Types.SourceDatabaseEmptyException if the source is not valid.
member.param: A reference to the execution context. An exception is thrown if this reference is null.
The ISimpleImportFile containing information about the source database.
The name of the result that cannot be created if the source is not valid. The method uses it in the error message.
The alias of the source database. The method uses it in the error message.
member.exception: If source is null or if source.DatabaseRecordCount is zero.
member.remarks: If source is null, the method logs the error message 'ResultCannotBeCreatedBecauseDatabaseNotImportedMessage' and throws a System.InvalidOperationException. If source.DatabaseRecordCount is zero, the method logs the error message 'ResultCreationFailureDatabaseEmptyMessage' and throws an Audicon.SmartAnalyzer.Common.Types.SourceDatabaseEmptyException.
